Function Documentation

int metal_condition_wait ( struct metal_condition *  cv,
metal_mutex_t *  m 
)

Block until the condition variable is notified. 

          Before calling this function, the caller should
          have acquired the mutex.
Parameters
[in]cvcondition variable
[in]mmutex
Returns
0 on success, non-zero on failure.
See Also
metal_condition_signal

References metal_irq_restore_enable(), and metal_irq_save_disable().
